xs:annotation.xs:documentation: VIDEOMD: LC-AV Video Metadata Extension Schema. VIDEOMD contains technical metadata that describe a digital video object. It is based upon metadata defined by LC. VIDEOMD contains 36 top-level elements. VIDEOMDType has 2 attributes, ID: (XML ID) ANALOGDIGITALFLAG: A major indicator of the type of video object i.e analog, phys_digital, or file_digital.

VIDEOSRC: LC-AV Video Metadata Extension Schema. VIDEOSRC contains technical metadata that describe a digital video object. It is based upon metadata defined by LC. VIDEOSRC contains 36 top-level elements. VIDEOSRCType has 2 attributes, ID: (XML ID) ANALOGDIGITALFLAG: A major indicator of the type of video object i.e Analog, PhysDigital, or FileDigital.

VIDEOMDType: Complex Type for encapsulating within a single parent element the individual video technical elements that describe a video object or portion thereof. The elements contained in VideoMD can be used independently of the VIDEOMD element and directly under a METS mdSec.dmWrap element. The individual elements that comprise VIDEOMD are documented under their corresponding types. VIDEOMDType has 2 attributes, ID: (XML ID) ANALOGDIGITALFLAG: A major indicator of the type of video object i.e Analog, PhysDigital, or FileDigital.

VIDEOSRCType: Complex Type for encapsulating within a single parent element the individual video technical elements that describe a video object or portion thereof. The elements contained in VideoSRC can be used independently of the VIDEOSRC element and directly under a METS mdSec.dmWrap element. The individual elements that comprise VIDEOSRC are documented under their corresponding types. VIDEOSRCType has 2 attributes, ID: (XML ID) ANALOGDIGITALFLAG: A major indicator of the type of video object i.e Analog, PhysDigital, or FileDigital.

aspect_ratioType: Complex Type for recording the desired aspect ratio of the image on screen e.g., 4:3, etc. Some files produced for display on non-square-pixel monitors have a desired aspect ratio that differs from the ratio of horizontal to vertical pixels in a byte from left to right. byte_orderType has no attributes.
bits_per_sampleType: Complex Type for recording size of a digital video sample in bits. bits_per_sampleType has no attributes.
byte_orderType: Complex Type for recording order of bit significance in a byte from left to right i.e. 0-least-to-most, 1-most-to-least. byte_orderType has no attributes.
closed_captioning_noteType: complexType for recording information about closed captioning in a video source item. closed_captioning_noteType has no attributes.
closed_captioning_noteType: complexType for recording the type of closed captioning in a video source item. closed_captioning_typeType has no attributes.
color_burstType: Indicates presence or absence of color burst signal in a video source item. color_burstType has no attributes.
conditionType: Complex Type for recording the physical condition of a video item. conditionType has no attributes.
data-_rateType: Complex Type for recording the data rate of a digital video file. data_rateType has no attributes.
data-_rate_modeType: Complex Type for recording the mode of the data rate in a digital video file. data_rate_modeType has no attributes.
dispositionType: Complex Type for recording what became of a video source item. dispositionType has no attributes.

dtvType: complexType for recording Information about a high definition TV video source item. dtvType has 1 attribute, ID (XML ID). - dtv_aspect_ratio: Aspect ratio of high definition video source item expressed as ratio, e.g., 4:3, 16:9, etc. - dtv_note: Note about a high definition video source item. - dtv_resolution: Resolution of high definition video source item expressed as horizontal lines. - dtv_scan: Indication whether high definition video source item is scanned in an interlaced or progressive mode.
durationType: Complex Type for recording the duration of a digital video file. durationType has no attributes.
format_nameType: complexType for recording the official name for the file format taken from the format documentation, e.g. "avi" or "mpeg". format_nameType has no attributes.
format_noteType: complexType for recording application specific information about the video file. e.g. Adobe Premiere 5.0, Real Video 3.0, etc.... format_versionType has no attributes.
format_versionType: complexType for recording the version of the video format specified in format_name e.g. for format_name="mpeg" format_version="2.0". format_versionType has no attributes.

frameType: Complex Type for recording the size of a frame in a digital video file. frameType has 1 attribute and 2 elements. ID: (XML ID). - pixels_horizontal: the horizontal dimension of a frame in pixels. - pixels_vertical: the vertical dimension of a frame in pixels.
generationType: complexType for recording the generation of a video source item. generationType has no attributes.

materialType: Complex Type for recording the physical characteristics of the construction and material of an audio source item. materialType has 1 attribute and 5 elements. ID: (XML ID) - base_material: type of material used in the recording carrier e.g plastic, glass, vinyl, mylar, etc... - binder: type of adhesive used to bind the recording surface to the substrate - disc_surface: the type of recording surface aluminium, celluloid etc.... - oxide: type of oxide used on the recording surface, e.g. cobalt, chromium dioxide, ferrous oxide - reflective_layer: type of material used on the recording surface, e.g. dye, tellurium-selenium alloy, etc.. - stock_brand: name of the manufacturer of the recording medium, e.g. Scotch, Maxell, Sony, etc...
noteType: Complex Type for recording miscellaneous information about the video file. e.g. digital alterations or enhancements to improve quality. format_versionType has no attributes.
number_carriersType: complexType for recording the number of containers holding a video source item. number_carriersType has no attributes.
phys_formatType: complexType for recording the physical format of the audio item. e.g. reel-to-reel tape, 1/4 inch cassette, etc... phys_formatType has no attributes.

samplingType: Complex Type for recording the video sampling format used in a digital video file. (in terms of luminance and chrominance), e.g., 4:2:0, 4:2:2, 2:4:4, etc.) samplingType has no attributes.
securityType: Complex Type for recording the the type of security applied to a digital video file e.g. password, encryption, hidden, etc.... securityType has no attributes.
signal_formatType: complexType for recording the signal format of a video source item e.g. NTSC, PAL, SECAM. signal_formatType has no attributes.
soundType: Complex Type for recording information that describes the sound component of the digital video file. soundType has a single attribute, ID (XML ID).

timecodeType: Complex Type for recording tracking information about a video source item. timecodeType has 1 attribute and 2 elements. ID: (XML ID) - timecode_record_method: Method for recording timecode on the video source item; - timecode_type: Type of timecode recorded on video source item, e.g., SMPTE dropframe, SMPTE nondropframe, etc..

trackingType: complexType for recording tracking information about a video source item. trackingType has 1 attribute and 2 elements. ID: (XML ID) - tracking_type: The type of tracking code, e.g., MAVIS number, actual shelf numbers, bar-code, etc.; - tracking_value: Shelf number or other identifier for source, e.g., MAVIS number, actual shelf numbers, etc..
useType: Complex Type for recording the use of the digital video file, e.g. Master, Service, Preview, etc..... securityType has a single attribute, ID (XML ID).
videodisc_typeType: complexType for indicating the type of videodisc used for a video source item. videodisc_typeType has no attributes.
videotape_typeType: complexType for recording the type of videotape used for a video source item. videotape_typeType has no attributes.
